Text:
Just wanted to take a minute & say thanx to eztv. This is one of my favorite shows. I don't have cable atm, so I rely on you for this & many other shows you post here. This helps save my sanity! I hope this comment finds you well in the ocean of comments you surely get.

A thousand thank yous!

As well I thank U EZTV - like I said in an other comment on Dexter THANK U THANK U THANK U for ur REAL TORRENTS and I know there are a million and one comments like the guy above said but if it weren't for u guys and girls taking the time to do what u do to upload these shows I don't know how I would get them since I'm in canada and we don't have HBO THANKS AGAIN
actually there is hbo in canada...
Thanks again. :) Looking forward pesperately fot the next... :P

eztv, 

Me too, I'll take this ocasion to thank you so very much for your impeccable work and spirit. I live in France, I don have a TV and if I had I certainly wouldn't have HBO. So if it weren't for you, I wouldn't have access to everything you share. 

THANK YOU.
